content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices McCain makes to develop his argument that the Senate should work together and return to its normal process of debate.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices McCain makes to develop his argument that the Senate should work together and return to its normal process of debate.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
